name: Jot Art
description: Jot Art (JOT) is Lithosphere's metaverse. Lithosphere is the next generation A.I network for cross-chain dApps. Jot Art's mission is to provide an ecosystem for everyone to create amazing, distributed virtual experiences with community and player-owned economies. JOT is a payment & governance token for the Jot Art metaverse. JOT holders will be able to claim rewards if they stake their tokens, pay for internal services in all Jot Art games, and participate in key governance votes. Players will also be able to earn ùìôJOT when they play various games within the Jot Art metaverse and through user-generated content initiatives.
